snippet: The Amsterdam Tattoo Museum opened in the fall in two beautifully restored 19th-century buildings. The collection is a wideranging one that documents the history of tattooing, from the Prehistoric era to the present day.
abstract: The Amsterdam Tattoo Museum opened in the fall in two beautifully restored 19th-century buildings. The collection is a wideranging one that documents the history of tattooing, from the Prehistoric era to the present day.

headline.main: Tattoos, Through Time: A New Museum for Amsterdam
